long_description: Make your own delectable grilled cheese or mouth-watering Reuben with this Camp Chef single-sandwich cooking iron. It's simple! Build your favorite sandwich, place it in the cooking iron, lock the iron closed and cook over a campfire flame or in a bed of hot coals. Cast iron diffuses and retains heat exceptionally well and can withstand very high temperatures, making it ideal for campfire use. Wooden grips provide secure and comfortable control while cooking. Recipes for breakfast, lunch and dinner included.
short_description: Make your own delectable grilled cheese or mouth-watering Reuben with this Camp Chef single-sandwich cooking iron.
